member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode
member.summary: A static class used to store global error codes.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheItemVersionMismatch
member.summary: The object in the cache does not match with the specified version; integer value equals 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheServerUnavailable
member.summary: One or more specified cache servers are unavailable; integer value equals 19.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.ClientServerVersionMismatch
member.summary: The cache client assemblies are a different version than the cache host assemblies; integer value equals 24.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.InvalidArgument
member.summary: The argument is not valid; integer value equals 5.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.InvalidCacheLockHandle
member.summary: The specified lock handle is not valid; integer value equals 15.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.InvalidEnumerator
member.summary: An invalid enumerator is specified; integer value equals 16.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.KeyAlreadyExists
member.summary: The key is already present in the cache or region; integer value equals 10.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.KeyDoesNotExist
member.summary: An object cached with the specified key does not exist in the cache or region; integer value equals 8.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.MaxNamedCacheCountExceeded
member.summary: The named cache count exceeded the maximum value; integer value equals 12.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.NamedCacheDoesNotExist
member.summary: The named cache does not exist; integer value equals 11.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.NotificationNotSupported
member.summary: Cache notifications are not supported because the cache client is a simple client or the named cache has been created without notifications enabled; integer value equals 20.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.NotPermittedForDefaultRegions
member.summary: The operation is only supported in regions that you explicitly create with the method; integer value equals 18.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.NullArgument
member.summary: A null has been specified as an argument; integer value equals 3.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.ObjectLocked
member.summary: The cached object has already been locked; integer value equals 13.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.ObjectNotLocked
member.summary: The object is not locked; integer value equals 14.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.RegionAlreadyExists
member.summary: The region already exists; integer value equals 9.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.RegionDoesNotExist
member.summary: The region does not exist; integer value equals 7.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.RetryLater
member.summary: Temporary failure, retry the operation later; integer value equals 22.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.SerializationException
member.summary: An exception was encountered during object serialization; integer value equals 25.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.ServerNull
member.summary: The servers parameter of the constructor or one of the items in the array is null; integer value equals 26.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.Timeout
member.summary: Communications with the cache cluster have experienced a delay past the timeout value; integer value equals 23.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.UndefinedError
member.summary: Unknown error; integer value equals 6.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheException
member.summary: Used for cache-related exceptions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class; allows you to provide a message with the exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class; allows you to provide serialization information with the exception.
member.param: Stores serialization information about an object.
Describes the source, destination, and context of a serialized stream.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class; allows you to provide a message and another exception with the exception.
member.param: Another exception related to this exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: The interface that is used for serialization.
member.param: The SerializationInfo class used to store all the data that you need to serialize the exception.
The StreamingContext class used to describe the source and destination of the exception.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheException.ErrorCode
member.summary: The integer used to identify the type of exception encountered.
member.returns: An integer specifying the type of exception encountered.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheException.Message
member.summary: The description of the exception encountered.
member.returns: A string that describes the type of exception encountered.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItem
member.summary: Used to retrieve all information associated with the cached object in the cluster.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItem.CacheName
member.summary: The name of the cache where the object is stored.
member.returns: A string value that represents the name of the cache where the object is stored.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItem.Key
member.summary: The identifier that is used to distinguish the cached object in the cache or region.
member.returns: A string value that represents the identifier that is used to distinguish the cached object in the cache or region.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItem.RegionName
member.summary: If applicable, the name of the region where the object is stored.
member.returns: A string value that represents, if applicable, the name of the region where the object is stored.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItem.Tags
member.summary: A generic list of tags associated with the cached object.
member.returns: An generic list of objects associated with the cached object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItem.Value
member.summary: The object stored in cache.
member.returns: An object representing the deserialized form of the cached object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItem.Version
member.summary: The version of the cached object.
member.returns: The is updated every time the object is updated. Only the latest version of the object is stored on the cache cluster. Due to the distributed nature of the cluster, the cache client may not have the latest copy of the object. For this reason, the class is essential for concurrency operations. For more information, see Concurrency Models (Velocity) and Concurrency Methods (Velocity).When using cache notifications, the object corresponding to an item-related cache operation can be returned to your application with the version parameter of the delegate method. For more information, see .Version comparisons are only meaningful when comparing versions of the same item specified with the same key. Comparison methods may return a result, but the result is only valid for versions of the same key.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion
member.summary: Used to represent the version of a cached object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion.CompareTo(Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion)
member.summary: Used to compare two versions of the same item, specified with the same key.
member.returns: An integer value: 0 if the versions are equal, greater than zero if the instance is greater than the version parameter value, or less than zero if the instance is less than the version parameter value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Used to determine whether another object is the same.
member.returns: A Boolean value: true, if the objects are the same; false, if they are different.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code of the object.
member.returns: An integer value that represents the hash code of the object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle
member.summary: The structure used as a key to lock and unlock cached objects in a pessimistic concurency scenario.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle.ToString
member.summary: Returns the string representation of the lock handle.
member.returns: A string representing the lock handle.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheLogSink
member.summary: Used to specify an individual log sink.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheLogSink.#ctor(Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheSinkType)
member.summary: Defines the type of log sink and assigns a TraceLevel of Warning.
member.param: The type of log sink, represented by the enumeration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheLogSink.#ctor(Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheSinkType,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel)
member.summary: Defines the type of log sink and assigns the specified TraceLevel.
member.param: The type of log sink, represented by the enumeration.
The TraceLevel of the log sink, represented by the enumeration. Available options include: No tracing, Error, Warning, Information, and Verbose.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheLogSink.#ctor(Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheSinkType,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel,System.String)
member.summary: Defines the type of log sink and assigns the specified TraceLevel. This overload also enables setting additional log sink parameters.
member.param: The type of log sink, represented by the enumeration.
The TraceLevel of the log sink, represented by the enumeration. Available options include: No tracing, Error, Warning, Information, and Verbose.
Only used for file-based logging to specify the file naming convention of the log file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheSinkType
member.summary: Used to specify the type of log sink used to trace events on the cache client.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheSinkType.CONSOLE
member.summary: Used to specify console-based log sinks.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheSinkType.ETW
member.summary: Used to specify Event Tracing for Windows (ETW)-based log sinks.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheSinkType.FILE
member.summary: Used to specify file-based log sinks.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheTag
member.summary: Represents an optional string-based identifier that you can associate with a cached object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheTag.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The string-based identifier to associate with a cached object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheTag.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the current object for equality with the specified object.
member.returns: True if the object implements the ToString method and its value is the same as the string representation of the current ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The object whose string representation is compared for equality to the current object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheTag.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for the current object.
member.returns: An integer representing the hash code for the current object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Caching.DataCacheTag.ToString
member.summary: Returns the string representation of the current object.
member.returns: A string representing the current value of the object.
